title: On compressing massive streaming graphs with Quadtrees
venue: 2015 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data)
excerpt: This paper discusses compressing massive streaming graphs using Quadtrees.
citation: Nelson, Michael, Radhakrishnan, Sridhar, Chatterjee, Amlan, Sekharan, Chandra N. (2015). "On compressing massive streaming graphs with Quadtrees." 2015 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data). 2409-2417.

title: Exploiting topological structures for graph compression based on quadtrees
venue: 2016 Second International Conference on Research in Computational Intelligence and Communication Networks (ICRCICN)
excerpt: This paper explores graph compression techniques leveraging topological structures and Quadtrees.
citation: Chatterjee, A., Levan, M., Lanham, C., Zerrudo, M., Nelson, M., Radhakrishnan, S. (2016). "Exploiting topological structures for graph compression based on quadtrees." 2016 Second International Conference on Research in Computational Intelligence and Communication Networks (ICRCICN). 192-197.

title: Queryable compression on streaming social networks
venue: 2017 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data)
excerpt: This paper introduces queryable compression techniques for streaming social networks.
citation: Nelson, Michael, Radhakrishnan, Sridhar, Chatterjee, Amlan, Sekharan, Chandra N. (2017). "Queryable compression on streaming social networks." 2017 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data). 988-993.

title: Queryable Compression on Time-Evolving Social Networks with Streaming
venue: 2018 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data)
excerpt: This paper presents queryable compression methods for time-evolving social networks with streaming.
citation: Nelson, Michael, Radhakrishnan, Sridhar, Sekharan, Chandra N. (2018). "Queryable Compression on Time-Evolving Social Networks with Streaming." 2018 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data). 146-151.

title: Billion-Scale Matrix Compression and Multiplication with Implications in Data Mining
venue: 2018 IEEE International Conference on Information Reuse and Integration (IRI)
excerpt: This paper discusses billion-scale matrix compression and its applications in data mining.
citation: Nelson, Michael, Radhakrishnan, Sridhar, Sekharan, Chandra N. (2019). "Billion-Scale Matrix Compression and Multiplication with Implications in Data Mining." 2018 IEEE International Conference on Information Reuse and Integration (IRI).

title: Algorithms on Compressed Time-Evolving Graphs
venue: 2019 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data)
excerpt: This paper explores algorithms for compressed time-evolving graphs.
citation: Nelson, Michael, Radhakrishnan, Sridhar, Sekharan, Chandra N. (2019). "Algorithms on Compressed Time-Evolving Graphs." 2019 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data).

title: Queryable Compression on Time-evolving Web and Social Networks with Streaming
venue: ACM Transactions on the Web (ACM Trans. Web)
excerpt: This paper proposes a compressed data structure for time-evolving web and social networks, enabling efficient queries and streaming operations.
citation: Nelson, Michael, Radhakrishnan, Sridhar, Sekharan, Chandra, Chatterjee, Amlan, Krishna, Sudhindra Gopal. (2021). "Queryable Compression on Time-evolving Web and Social Networks with Streaming." ACM Transactions on the Web (ACM Trans. Web). 16(2).

title: On Compressing Time-Evolving Networks
venue: ALLDATA 2021, The Seventh International Conference on Big Data, Small Data, Linked Data and Open Data
excerpt: This paper investigates compression techniques for time-evolving networks.
